page.title: 03SETTLEMENT
page.content: The settlement in the map area is of two main types:- isolated {farms}and small clusters of cottages. { Inchmarlo}is a tiny community. Near the point where the Canny burn crosses the North Deeside Road a Post Office-general store, village hall and a handfull of houses stand close to the road. An antiques shop a few hundred yards east and other clusters of houses on either side of the water works complete the community. To the south of the river there is little settlement other than a small group of {Forestry Commission}workers' houses. Cairnton House and {Inchmarlo House are large houses built by local estate owners. {Inchmarlo}is about to become the centre of a settlement of over 120 homes for the elderly.
